titleStmt.title: Montanism revived by Philip Hermon, a Quaker cobler, and chief speaker at the Savoy meeting; confuted with some of his antichristian principles and prophecies: to which is added some reasons for my leaving the Quakers. By Clement Joynes.
titleStmt.author: Joynes, Clement.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
